'''Singing in the Tranquil Court''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Singing in the Tranquil Court is obtainable by buying the Gnostic Chorus package of the [[Battle Pass/Artful Intent|Artful Intent]] Battle Pass.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
